channel.title: Vegetable Gardening on Williamsburg Community Garden
channel.description: Recent content in Vegetable Gardening on Williamsburg Community Garden

item.title: A Guide to Growing a Diverse Garden: Choose right plants
item.description: A thriving community garden is built on diversityâ€”from fresh vegetables and fragrant herbs to vibrant flowers and pollinator-friendly plants. At Williamsburg Community Garden (WCG), we encourage members to explore different plant varieties suited for our local climate and soil. Whether you’re a seasoned gardener or a beginner, this guide will help you choose the best plants for your garden plot.
